subject: Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A third defendant pleaded guilty in the beating death of the former Villanova star Howard Porter a day before his trial was to start. Fredquinzo King pleaded guilty to one count of second-degree murder and one count of kidnapping, and he will be sentenced Oct. 13.
